CustomField.description: The API name of the source object that the new field values will be read from. Example: Account, Opportunity, cscfga__Product_Configuration__c, cscfga__Product_Basket__c, csmso__Sales_Order__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The API name of the source object that the new field values will be read from. Example: Account, Opportunity, cscfga__Product_Configuration__c, cscfga__Product_Basket__c, csmso__Sales_Order__c
CustomField.label: Source Object API Name
